mapper.select: SELECT me_id as meId, me_code as meCode, me_name as meName, me_link as meLink, me_target as meTarget FROM COMTNMENUINFONEW WHERE me_use = 1 AND me_code= #{parentCode}

SELECT me_id as meId, me_code as meCode, me_name as meName, me_link as meLink, me_target as meTarget FROM COMTNMENUINFONEW WHERE me_use = 1 AND me_link like CONCAT('%',#{ctnId},'%') ORDER BY me_code DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT me_id as meId, me_code as meCode, me_name as meName, me_link as meLink, me_target as meTarget
FROM COMTNMENUINFONEW WHERE me_use = 1
AND me_place ='0'
AND me_place ='1'
ORDER BY me_code ASC
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM COMTNMENUINFONEW WHERE me_code like CONCAT(#{meCode},'%') AND me_code != #{meCode}
SELECT * FROM COMTNMENUINFONEW ORDER BY me_place ASC, me_code ASC

SELECT MAX(me_code) as meCode FROM COMTNMENUINFONEW WHERE 1=1
AND length(me_code) = 2
AND length(me_code) = 4 and me_code like CONCAT(#{meParent},'%')
AND length(me_code) = 6 and me_code like CONCAT(#{meParent},'%')

SELECT me_id AS meId, me_code AS meCode, me_name AS meName, me_link AS meLink, me_target AS meTarget, me_order AS meOrder, me_use AS meUse, me_place AS mePlace FROM COMTNMENUINFONEW WHERE me_id = #{meId}

SELECT MENU_NO AS menuNo , MENU_ORDR AS menuOrdr , MENU_NM AS menuNm , UPPER_MENU_NO AS upperMenuId , MENU_DC AS menuDc , RELATE_IMAGE_PATH AS relateImagePath , RELATE_IMAGE_NM AS relateImageNm , PROGRM_FILE_NM AS progrmFileNm , LINK_URL AS linkUrl FROM COMTNMENUINFO WHERE binary(MENU_NM) like CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
SELECT COUNT(MENU_NO) AS totcnt FROM COMTNMENUINFO WHERE binary(MENU_NM) like CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT MENU_NO AS menuNo , MENU_ORDR AS menuOrdr , MENU_NM AS menuNm , UPPER_MENU_NO AS upperMenuId , MENU_DC AS menuDc , RELATE_IMAGE_PATH AS relateImagePath , RELATE_IMAGE_NM AS relateImageNm , PROGRM_FILE_NM AS progrmFileNm , LINK_URL AS linkUrl FROM COMTNMENUINFO WHERE MENU_NO = #{searchKeyword}

SELECT MENU_NO AS menuNo , MENU_ORDR AS menuOrdr , MENU_NM AS menuNm , UPPER_MENU_NO AS upperMenuId , MENU_DC AS menuDc , RELATE_IMAGE_PATH AS relateImagePath , RELATE_IMAGE_NM AS relateImageNm , PROGRM_FILE_NM AS progrmFileNm , LINK_URL AS linkUrl FROM COMTNMENUINFO WHERE MENU_NO >= 10000000 ORDER BY MENU_ORDR
SELECT COUNT(MENU_NO) AS totcnt FROM COMTNMENUINFO
